translation.en: ♪ I say you can't bеcause I lost it When I knew you were alive ♪ ♪ I'll go anywhere you wanna go ♪

translation.ko: "벤 호프: 그냥 쉬는 시간에 만나도 돼?"

translation.en: [principal over PA] Happy New Year, Truham boys.
Uh, don't forget there'll now be students from all school years
translation.ko: 올해부턴 한 학급에 모든 학년이 배정될 거예요

translation.en: in your new form groups. I hope you enjoy getting to know
translation.ko: 새 학급에서 조회 시간마다 "새 학급 교실 - B25"

translation.en: some fresh faces in registration each day.
translation.ko: 새로운 얼굴을 알아가며 즐거운 한 해 보내기 바랍니다

translation.en: Oh! If it isn't Charlie Spring. Happy New Year.
translation.ko: 찰리 스프링이구나 새해 복 많이 받아라

translation.en: Where did I put you on the seating plan?
He's in Year 11, so only one year older than you.
translation.ko: 쟤는 11학년이니까 너보다 딱 한 살 많네

translation.en: One of the rugby boys too, I think. I'm sure you'll get along swimmingly.
translation.ko: 럭비 팀 소속인 듯한데 친하게 지낼 수 있을 거야

translation.en: Or you can just sit in silence for the rest of the year.
translation.ko: 아니면 1년 내내 말없이 앉아 있어도 되고

translation.en: It really doesn't affect me in any way whatsoever.
translation.ko: 어떻게 지내든 나랑은 아무 상관 없으니까

translation.en: I missed your face so much.
Really? Did you have a good Christmas?
Yeah, it was all right. You?
Yeah. Yeah, it was good. Um…
My whole family was around on Christmas day and then…
-Still don't tell anyone about this. -Oh. Um…
Are you literally doing your homework while walking to your lesson?
translation.ko: 수업 들으러 가면서 숙제하고 있는 거야?

translation.en: That makes me sound way cooler than I actually am.
translation.ko: 그렇게 말하니까 쓸데없이 멋진 것 같다

translation.en: Do you want me to do that for you?
-No, I'm good. -I can tell you the answer.
If you're stuck I can just… Let me just…
[chuckles] Why are you talking to me? I don't know who you are.
translation.ko: 나 알아? 왜 모르는 사람한테 말을 걸어?

translation.en: Uh, yeah. He's in my year.
-Didn't you do that yesterday? -Yes, Isaac. Yes, I did.
translation.ko: - 어제도 그러지 않았어? - 그래, 아이작, 어제도 그랬지

translation.en: -She's not been here all week. -I know. I keep forgetting.
translation.ko: - 일주일 내내 없었다고 - 아는데 자꾸 까먹는다고

translation.en: Tao, you're allowed to miss her.
translation.ko: 타오, 엘 보고 싶어 해도 괜찮아

translation.en: It's better that she's at an all-girls school.
translation.ko: 여학교에 다니는 게 엘한테도 좋을 테니까

translation.en: Mr. Reed was still refusing to call her Elle.
translation.ko: 리드 선생님은 아직도 걔를 '엘'이라고 안 불러

translation.en: Yeah. Mr. Reed's a massive transphobe.
There used to be four of us, now there's only three.
The guy you sit next to in form?
translation.ko: 학급 조회 때 네 옆에 앉는 애?

translation.en: -Who? -[Tao] He looks like a golden retriever.
[Charlie] He doesn't look like a golden retriever.
I can't believe you've been sat next to rugby king Nick Nelson.
translation.ko: '럭비 킹' 닉 넬슨이랑 네가 짝이라니 어이없다

translation.en: What are you going to talk about?
Charlie, you don't have a tissue, do you?
-[Nick] It's not coming off. -You're gonna be blue forever.
translation.ko: - 안 지워져 - 평생 파란 손으로 살아야겠네

translation.en: Looks like I'm wearing blue gloves!
You can make it the new school fashion.
Or I'll pretend it's a tattoo.

translation.ko: - 뭐? 왜? - 왜라니, 쟤들 좀 봐

translation.en: We are a group. No, a trio of borderline outcasts.
He is the star player on the rugby team,
and he's friends with a bunch of loud, gross Year 11s
who are like the guys who bullied you last year.
I bet he's a whole different person when he's with his bro dude friends.
translation.ko: 험하게 노는 친구들이랑 같이 있을 땐 완전 다른 모습일걸

translation.en: [woman] Lunch ends in five minutes, girls.
We don't make exceptions, even for new students.
You can have this back from reception at the end of the day.
[Ben] You know I'm sorry about ignoring you yesterday.
[teacher] It's quite a while since you've hidden in here at lunch.
translation.ko: 네가 점심시간에 여기 숨는 거 오랜만이네

translation.en: No bullies I need to sort out again?
Actually, there is kind of someone.
I don't think he even thinks we're boyfriends anyway.
translation.ko: 걔는 저를 남자친구로 생각하지 않는 것 같아요

translation.en: He doesn't even like people seeing us talk to each other in the corridors.
translation.ko: 혹시 누가 볼까 봐 복도에서 저랑 얘기도 안 해요

translation.en: He pretends like he doesn't know who I am.
[sighs] But then when it's just us two he's fine.
Well, have you talked to him about how that makes you feel?
translation.ko: 네 기분이 어떤지 걔한테 얘기해 봤어?

translation.en: Maybe you should talk to him then?
What do you want me to say? Break up with him?
translation.ko: 무슨 답을 원해? 걔랑 헤어지라고 할까?

translation.en: -[Charlie] I don't know. -Well, do you want to break up with him?
I can't solve your problems for you, Charlie.
translation.ko: 이건 네가 직접 해결해야 할 문제 같구나

translation.en: What about your friends, have you talked to them about it?
It's better to be honest about your feelings in the long run.
translation.ko: 길게 보면 솔직히 대하는 게 나아

translation.en: I know. It took you three months to tell me you were being bullied.
translation.ko: 알아, 괴롭힘당하는 거 나한테 말하는 데도 석 달 걸렸지

translation.en: -I'd never lie to you, don't worry. -Okay.
translation.ko: - 너한텐 거짓말 안 해, 걱정 마 - 알았어

translation.en: -We will. If you're nice. -Never mind then.
translation.ko: - 너만 착하게 굴면 돼 - 그럼 걱정 없네

translation.en: I broke up with my boyfriend.
Hypothetically, what sort of boy do you want to go out with?
translation.ko: 누구든 사귈 수 있다면 어떤 애랑 사귀고 싶어?

translation.en: One who doesn't mind people seeing us talk to each other would be nice.
translation.ko: 나랑 얘기하는 모습을 남들한테 보여도 괜찮은 애

translation.en: or do you want an "opposites attract" thing?
I don't think I can afford to be that specific, to be honest.
translation.ko: 난 그렇게 콕 짚어서 골라잡을 능력 안 되거든

translation.en: Just someone I can have a laugh with.
I'd probably just settle for someone tall.
translation.ko: 그냥 키 큰 애면 괜찮을 것 같기도 해

translation.en: We've been doing this all term and no one's beaten Charlie's time yet.
translation.ko: 이번 학기 내내 뛰었는데 아직 아무도 찰리 기록 못 깼어!

translation.en: Charlie's leaving you all in the dust!
So, um, I had something I wanted to ask you.
Charlie… I wanted to tell you that I'm gay too.
translation.ko: 찰리, 전부터 얘기하고 싶었는데 나도 게이야

translation.en: And I'm in love with you.
Do you want to go out with me?
I want to be with you forever.
Do you want to join the rugby team?
We have enough players for the team
but we're not allowed to actually play against other teams without a reserve.
translation.ko: 다른 팀이랑 경기하려면 후보 선수가 있어야 하거든

translation.en: And I saw you run in PE and you're, like, really fast.
translation.ko: 체육 시간에 보니까 너 달리기가 진짜 빠르더라

translation.en: So… I thought you might be interested.
I don't really know how to play.
That's fine. I can teach you.
Aren't I a bit small and weak to be a rugby player?
translation.ko: 럭비를 하기엔 난 좀 작고 약골 아니야?

translation.en: We're just a school team, you know. It's not that serious.
translation.ko: 그냥 학교 팀인데, 뭘 진지하게 생각 안 해도 돼

translation.en: So you're saying I am small and weak?
So, do you want to join?
It's literally just another silly crush.
It's not a crush. I don't just fall for any guy who's nice to me.
translation.ko: 아니야, 친절히 대해준다고 아무한테나 반하는 건 아니거든

translation.en: And you're sure you want to spend a whole hour
translation.ko: 진짜로 원해서 저 멍청한 럭비 팀 거구들이랑

translation.en: -[boy 2] Isn't he in Year 8? -[boy 3] No. Year 10.
I'm sure he's a nice guy but we actually want to be dece.
translation.ko: 애는 착하겠지만 제대로 된 선수가 필요하다고

translation.en: I know I was joking about being weak, but I'm definitely too weak for this.
translation.ko: 약골이란 건 농담이었지만 이 스포츠에선 약골 맞는 것 같아
할 수 있단 자신감은 어디 있어?

translation.en: Just try. Tackle me, I won't dodge.
translation.ko: 일단 해보자 나 태클해 봐, 안 피할게

translation.en: Come on, I bet you can do it.
Now, let's try again while I'm actually moving.
translation.ko: 자, 다시 해보자 이번엔 나도 움직일 거야

translation.en: Yeah, you got it. One more time, come on.
One, two, three, squeeze! One, two, three, squeeze!
[boy] Come on, mate. We've got practice.
And you try and run up to me.
You're wearing a coat? It's not even cold.
God, what's your problem? I'm trying to be nice.
translation.ko: 대체 왜 그래? 난 친절하게 굴고 있는데

translation.en: I said I don't want to meet up anymore.
You're clearly just scared of getting caught.
Why would I be scared of getting caught?
Everyone in school already knows I'm gay.
translation.ko: 내가 게이인 거 이 학교 전체가 다 아는데

translation.en: You're the one who's scared of getting caught.
You can't even look at me when other people are around.
translation.ko: 주변에 누가 있으면 날 쳐다보지도 못하잖아

translation.en: Not to mention the fact that you have a girlfriend.
Yeah. I've seen you with her at the school gate.
translation.ko: 그래, 교문 앞에서 여친이랑 있는 거 봤어

translation.en: Don't be angry at me for not wanting to come out yet.
If you're figuring stuff out, fine. Take your time.
translation.ko: 고민 중인 건 괜찮아 천천히 생각해

translation.en: I would have been there for you.
Don't you think I, of all people, would understand you're figuring out your sexuality?
translation.ko: 네가 성적 정체성을 찾는 중인 걸 내가 이해 못 할 것 같아?

translation.en: Then why are you angry at me?
I'm angry because you never even slightly cared about my feelings.
translation.ko: 네가 내 기분을 조금도 신경 쓰지 않았으니까

translation.en: We only ever meet up when you want to.
Where you want to. When you feel like kissing a boy.
translation.ko: 네가 원하는 곳에서만 만나지 네가 남자애랑 키스하고 싶을 때만

translation.en: You don't care about me at all.
It's not like anyone else is going to want to go out with you, is it?
translation.ko: 내가 아니면 너랑 사귈 사람도 없잖아?

translation.en: -I know you like me. -[Charlie] Stop it!
Charlie, I like you but I'm figuring stuff out.
translation.ko: 찰리, 네가 좋은데 아직 생각이 정리 안 됐어

translation.en: What more do you want from me?
Did you hear all of that?
You seemed kind of like something was up while we were getting changed, so I…
translation.ko: 아까 옷 갈아입을 때 무슨 걱정이 있는 것 같아 보여서

translation.en: I wanted to check everything was okay.
You have nothing to be sorry about.
-I kind of want to say it. -[chuckles] Don't.
We'll get locked in if we stay here much longer.
translation.ko: 더 있으면 밖에서 문 잠글 거야
"닉 - 15분 전 접속 인스타그램에서 서로 팔로우 중"
